**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 89 2.0 **Tradition** [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** 1 minute --- Invoking the celestial realms, you transform into a Medium angel battle form. When you cast this spell, choose [balisse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2816), [choral](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2815), kuribu, or tennin. The battle form is Small if you choose choral or kuribu. While in this form, you gain the [angel](/Traits.aspx?ID=530) and [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=551) traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645) actions. You can [Dismiss](/Actions.aspx?ID=2311) the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:
  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 [temporary Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2321) and weakness 10 to [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521).
  • [Darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) condition, for example), and ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.
You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose: - **[Balisse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2816)** Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; [Perception](/Rules.aspx?ID=2298) modifier of +26 to detect lies and [illusions](/Traits.aspx?ID=629) unless your own modifier is higher; **Melee** [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=393) ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=611), [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=708)), **Damage** 2d6+12 slashing plus 2d6 fire. - **[Choral](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2815)** Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; +1 status bonus to AC and saves against [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697) and [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541); **Melee** [fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)), **Damage** 2d6+12 bludgeoning; **Ranged** piercing hymn ([holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [range 90 feet](/Rules.aspx?ID=2195), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697)), **Damage** 3d6+12 sonic, and [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=66) for 1 round on a critical hit. - **Kuribu** Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet; [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2318) 10 to [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) and [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604); **Melee** [fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)), **Damage** 3d4+12 bludgeoning; **Ranged** [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=435) ([deadly 2d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=570), [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=677), [range increment 60 feet](/Rules.aspx?ID=2195)), **Damage** 3d6+12 piercing. - **Tennin** Speed 30 feet, fly 60 feet; can [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=2304) into [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=2366) and use land and fly Speeds to Step; **Melee** [fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661)), **Damage** 1d6+12 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold and 1d6 spirit. --- **Heightened (9th)** Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to evil damage, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.
name: Angel Form
